content: प्रकरणं {@--1@} Treating, explaining, discussing. {@--2@} ({%a%}) A subject, topic, department, a subject (of representation); कतमत्प्रकरणमाश्रित्य <ls>Ś. 1.</ls> ({%b%}) A head or subject of treatment. ({%c%}) A province or department. {@--3@} A section, chapter or any smaller division of a work. {@--4@} An opportunity, occasion. {@--5@} An affair, a matter. {@--6@} An introduction, prologue. {@--7@} Relation. {@--8@} Doing much or well. {@--9@} A species of drama with invented or fictitious plot; as the मृच्छकटिक, मालतीमाधव, पुष्पभूषित &c. The <ls>S. D.</ls> thus defines it:-- भवेत् प्रकरणे वृत्तं लौकिकं कविकल्पितं . शृंगारोंऽगी नायकस्तु विप्रोऽमात्योऽथवा वणिक् . सापायधर्मकामार्थपरो धीरप्रशांतकः .. <ls n="S. D.">511.</ls>
